long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
WebSecure: Protect Yourself from Online Scams and Fraud
WebSecure is your ultimate companion for safer browsing. Designed to help users verify website legitimacy and protect against online scams, this powerful browser extension empowers you to browse confidently and securely.

Features:
Domain Content Verification: Instantly scans homepage text to ensure it matches the domain name, helping identify fraudulent websites.
Reverse Image Search Integration: Quickly verify the origin of images on webpages to detect stolen content or identify scams using unauthorized images.
Confidence Level Indicator: Get a clear and visual assessment of a website's trustworthiness with color-coded confidence levels based on content analysis.
Custom Warnings: Receive real-time alerts for suspicious sites with easy-to-understand banners and icons.
User-Friendly Design: A simple, intuitive interface ensures that even non-technical users can enhance their online security with ease.
Why WebSecure?
Every day, scammers exploit unsuspecting users with fake websites and stolen content. WebSecure acts as your digital guardian, providing you with the tools to make informed decisions about the websites you visit. Whether youâ€™re shopping online, browsing social media, or doing research, WebSecure ensures your experience is secure and scam-free.

Who Should Use WebSecure?
Online shoppers looking to avoid fake e-commerce sites.
Individuals concerned about phishing and fraudulent activities.
Professionals and researchers who need to verify content authenticity.
